item.title: Italian Sausage with Potatoes and Peppers
item.description: Source: Robyn Kelly Ingredients 1 1/2 pounds Italian sausage 3 to 5 Russet potatoes 3 green peppers 1/4 cup water Salt and pepper to taste 1 onion Directions Preheat oven to 400Â°. Slice potatoes thin and layer on bottom of baking dish. Season potatoes. Thinly slice peppers and onions; layer over the potatoes before seasoning. Crumble uncooked sausage over the vegetables. Pour water into baking dish; cover dish with foil.
